Name: Mecha Snake
About the game: Choose a game speed. Avoid obstacles and take care of enemies. Collect segments. They will make the snake longer and improve its armor, attack, or perception. The enemy base is made of procedurally chosen blocks and their difficulty increases as you earn points. The main objective is to reach the best score, get many medals to achieve it.
